message: The first batch of bell peppers moved into their new deep-water culture beds this week! They’re already standing taller under the adjusted LED spectrum.
We split our overwintered bee colony and installed two new nucs beside the wildflower field. Fingers crossed for a heavy flow once the clover opens!
Reclaimed stable footings now hold raised beds filled with compost and biochar. The soil temp probes are finally reading above 10°C—time to direct seed!
